title: Bioprocess Engineering
description: Integrating several ChBE core concepts, bioprocess engineering applies the material to biological systems. Items covered are enzyme kinetics, fermentation, downstream processing, and integrated bioprocesses important to the biotech industries.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 4511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3521 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CHBE 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CHBE 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CHBE 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CHBE 4300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CHBE 4320 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
